name: Chainsaw Run
description:
Chainsaw Run was inspired by Atari games and retro arcade games. 

You have to navigate through pitch black rooms and try find the key to unlock the door and progress to the next room also looking out for bear traps, and there's a crazed killer! It is an infinite runner at the moment but I would like to add a story mode to it.

Please let me know if you enjoyed it! Thanks :)
